void Form::alienFire (  )  [private, slot]

this method creates and stop alien ship firing added by Ivan Collazo

Definition at line 857 of file form.cpp.

00858 {
00859     // stops alien ship firing when player loses game
00860     if (Constants::count == 0 )
00861     {
00862             timer3->disconnect(board->scene, SLOT(alienFire()));
00863             timer3->stop();
00864     }
00865 
00866     // stops alien ship firing when level is won
00867     else if (Constants::levelNumber == 4)
00868     {
00869         timer3->disconnect(board->scene, SLOT(alienFire()));
00870         timer3->stop();
00871     }
00872 
00873     // stops alien ship firing when alien ship is destoryed
00874     else if (alienShip->getShipHit() == 0)
00875     {
00876         timer3->disconnect(board->scene, SLOT(alienFire()));
00877         timer3->stop();
00878     }
00879 
00880     // keeps firing alien bullets
00881     else
00882     {
00883         alienShip->fire();
00884     }
00885 }

void Form::keyPressEvent ( QKeyEvent *  event  )  [protected]

added by Ivan Collazo, modified by Manpreet Kohli function that gets called when a key is pressed during the game

Definition at line 717 of file form.cpp.

00718 {
00719     switch(event->key())
00720     {
00721         case Qt::Key_A: // move space ship to the left
00722             if (!Constants::timer->isActive())
00723             {
00724                 if (playersShip->getShipPosX() <= -330)
00725                 {
00726                     playersShip->moveBy(0, 0);
00727                     ball->moveBy(0, 0);
00728                 }
00729                 else
00730                 {
00731                     playersShip->moveBy(-30, 0);
00732                     playersShip->setShipPosX(-30);
00733                     ball->moveBy(-30, 0);
00734                     ball->setPositionX(-30);
00735                     ball->setShipPositon(playersShip->getShipPosX());
00736                 }
00737             }
00738             else
00739             {
00740                 if (playersShip->getShipPosX() <= -330)
00741                     playersShip->moveBy(0, 0);
00742                 else
00743                 {
00744                     playersShip->moveBy(-30,0);
00745                     playersShip->setShipPosX(-30);
00746                     ball->setShipPositon(playersShip->getShipPosX());
00747                 }
00748             }
00749             break;
00750 
00751         case Qt::Key_D: // move space ship to the right
00752             if (!Constants::timer->isActive())
00753             {
00754                 if (playersShip->getShipPosX() >= 330)
00755                     playersShip->moveBy(0, 0);
00756 
00757                 else
00758                 {
00759                     playersShip->moveBy(30,0);
00760                     playersShip->setShipPosX(30);
00761                     ball->moveBy(30, 0);
00762                     ball->setPositionX(30);
00763                     ball->setShipPositon(playersShip->getShipPosX());
00764                 }
00765             }
00766 
00767             else
00768             {
00769                 if (playersShip->getShipPosX() >= 330)
00770                     playersShip->moveBy(0, 0);
00771                 else
00772                 {
00773                     playersShip->moveBy(30,0);
00774                     playersShip->setShipPosX(30);
00775                     ball->setShipPositon(playersShip->getShipPosX());
00776                 }
00777             }
00778             break;
00779 
00780         // Ivan Collazo
00781         // Case statement when space bar is pressed to fire weapons
00782         case Qt::Key_Space:
00783              if ((Constants::levelNumber == 1) || (Constants::levelNumber == 2)) // Levels with no weapons fired
00784              {
00785 
00786              }
00787              else if (Constants::levelNumber == 4) // Level with Missiles Fired
00788              {  
00789                  missiles = new ShipsMissiles(); // Ivan Collazo
00790                  missiles->setShipMissilesXPosition(playersShip->getShipPosX()); // Ivan Collazo
00791                  board->scene->addItem(missiles); // Ivan Collazo
00792                  playersShip->fireMissiles()    ; // Ivan Collazo
00793              }
00794              else // Level with Bullets Fired
00795              {
00796                  bullets = new ShipBullet(); // Ivan Collazo
00797                  bullets->setShipBulletXPosition(playersShip->getShipPosX()); // Ivan Collazo
00798                  board->scene->addItem(bullets); // Ivan Collazo
00799                  playersShip->fireBullets(); // Ivan Collazo
00800              }
00801              break;
00802 
00803          case Qt::Key_Return:
00804              // added by Natraj Subramanian
00805              if(!Constants::timer->isActive())
00806              {
00807                  board->connectTimerToBall();         // connect the timer to the ball
00808                  break;
00809              }
00810 
00811          case Qt::Key_Period:
00812              // added by Manpreet Kohli
00813              // if period key is pressed, set cheat mode to on
00814              ball->setSkip(true);
00815              break;
00816     }
00817 }

00631     for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++)
00632     {

00635             bool temp = false;
00636             for (int k = 0; k < Constants::positions.size(); k++)

00653                             break;
00654                         case 5:
00655                             out << "m";
00656                             break;
00657                         case 6:
00658                             out << "y";
00659                             break;
00660                         case 7:
00661                             out << "t";
00662                             break;

00664                     temp = true;
00665                     break;

00667             }
00668             if (temp == false)
